metadata.subject: RE: [patchmanagement] October patches
metadata.email_text_clean:
We’re seeing this on our test Hyper-V host, which is Windows Server 2019. 
We’re also not using Veeam, but using Microsoft’s own replication with Azure
Site Recovery. 
Deleting only the RCT files appears to have worked for the affected guests. 
BRIAN ILLNER 
| 
Senior Systems Administrator

metadata.email_text_original:
October patches 
We’re seeing this on our test Hyper-V host, which is Windows Server 2019. 
We’re also not using Veeam, but using Microsoft’s own replication with Azure
Site Recovery. 
Deleting only the RCT files appears to have worked for the affected guests. 
BRIAN ILLNER 
| 
Senior Systems Administrator 
864.250.9227 Office 
864.679.2537 Fax
